abstract: Jury deliberating in murder trial of Pedro Hernandez requests to review testimony of Chelsea Altman, childhood friend of Etan Patz who saw him shortly before his death in 1979; request may indicate that jury is still working through evidence.
lead_paragraph: A Manhattan jury deciding the fate of a man charged with murdering Etan in 1979 asked to see the testimony of Chelsea Altman, who saved a seat for him on the school bus the day he disappeared.

headline.main: Jury Reviews the Testimony of Etan Patz’s Childhood Friend
headline.print_headline: Jury Reviews the Testimony of Patz’s Childhood Friend
